author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two youths were arrested on Friday evening in connection with the murder of a woman in Pathalvilai near Nagercoil on November 25.

Parimalam (52) of Pathalvilai was found murdered inside an abandoned car by the police after the local people lodged a complaint.

A few persons, including a woman, were arrested in connection with the case by Kottar police which launched a search for two others – Ajai and Vijay.

Meanwhile, the duo had allegedly robbed one Hari near Kambalam area. Alerted by Mr. Hari, a police patrol team rushed to the spot and arrested the duo.

Inquiry revealed that the two were wanted in connection with the murder of Parimalam. They confessed to have committed the crime.

Remanded

They were remanded in judicial custody after being produced before a magistrate court in Nagercoil on Saturday.
title: Two youths arrested for murder of woman
